text: Gran Turismo 2 is the second racing game in the Gran Turismo series. Game is developed by Polyphony Digital and published by Sony Computer Entertainment in 1999 for PlayStation. The game has over 500 cars http://www.gtplanet.net/library/gran-turismo-2/ and over 20 tracks. ==References== Category:1999 video games Category:Gran Turismo series Category:Off-road racing video games Category:PlayStation games Category:PlayStation-only games Category:Racing simulators Category:Racing video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Gran Turismo 2
